definitions.text: the real physical matter of which a person or thing consists
examples: DNA is the substance of our genes

definitions.text: the choicest or most essential or most vital part of some idea or experience
examples: the gist of the prosecutor's argument
the heart and soul of the Republican Party
What is the meaning of this proverb?

definitions.text: material of a particular kind or constitution
examples: the immune response recognizes invading substances
he is a man of means

definitions.text: what a communication that is about something is about
a particular kind or species of matter with uniform properties
examples: shigella is one of the most toxic substances known to man
